text: End of game#Check the journal to get the final impacts effects : Impact of Population Impact of Progress Impact of Strength Impact of Technology Impact of Variety Impact of Balance WINNER IS X L AS ORANGE (281 PTS) 2nd is teddy yeh as Green (224 pts) 3rd is David Li as Grey (182 pts) 4th is Micah Yospe as Purple (resigned) #

Impact of Balance#Each civilization scores culture equal to double the amount of whatever it produces the least (science, culture, food, or resource). Ignore corruption and consumption. Orange scores 6 culture Green scores 12 culture Grey scores 8 culture #
Impact of Variety#Each civilization scores 2 culture for each type of unit, urban building and special (blue) technology. Orange scores 12 culture Green scores 22 culture Grey scores 14 culture #
Impact of Technology#Each civilization scores 4 culture for each of its level III technologies (level II in Advanced game). Orange scores 12 culture Green scores 20 culture Grey scores 8 culture #
Impact of Strength#Each civilizations score culture according to their relative strength: 15/10/5/0 for 4-player 14/7/0 for 3-player 10/0 for 2-player Orange scores 7 culture Grey scores 14 culture #
Impact of Progress#Each civilization scores 2 culture per level of each of its government and special (blue) technologies. Orange scores 20 culture Green scores 16 culture Grey scores 10 culture #
Impact of Population#Each civilization scores 2 culture per content worker above 10. Orange scores 16 culture Green scores 16 culture Grey scores 14 culture #
